## Abstract
Call for Standing Offer: RCMP Detention Guard Services in CLCAs

**Reference Number:** WS4104591303

**Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
**Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
**Procurement Category:** Service
**Procurement Method:** Competitive Tender
**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
**Original Solicitation Date:** May 3, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** May 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET
**Current Tender Status:** Expired

### Description of Requirement

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires Detention Guards to supervise and assist incarcerated individuals in remote and difficult-to-access areas within the Nunatsiavut territory of Newfoundland and Labrador.  The contract involves providing services in four RCMP detachment cells.

The Federal Policing Program is seeking a contractor to provide Detention Guard services on an as-and-when-required basis. The services required are specialized and highly sensitive in nature. The contractor will be responsible for:

* Providing Detention Guards to assist with the supervision and care of incarcerated individuals
* Ensuring the safety and well-being of individuals in the detention cells
* Reporting incidents and providing recommendations for improvements

### Eligibility and Selection Criteria

To be eligible to bid, contractors must:

* Possess the necessary certification, training, and experience to provide Detention Guard services
* Meet the qualifications outlined in the Statement of Work (SOW)
* Certify compliance with the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

The selection criteria is based on the lowest responsive bid for the Standing Offer.

### Post-Submission Evaluation Process

The evaluation will be conducted in accordance with the evaluation criteria outlined in the RSO. Tenderers must provide sufficient information to demonstrate compliance with all mandatory requirements. The evaluation will be conducted to select the contractor to be awarded the Standing Offer.
